text_block_list.text: After today, summer training camp will be over. These past few days, there was one thing that was bothering me-
It seemed like Kitasan Black was always watching me. She'd look in my direction every now and then, as if checking on me, but why…?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah! What's wrong?! If there's anything bothering you, just let me know!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Ah, preparing the equipment for the next part of training? Leave it to me, I'll have it ready in no time―!
Without waiting for a response, Kitasan Black ran off to prepare for the next part of training.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa… yaaaaaaaa!
I missed the chance to ask why she was watching me, and training continued.
Kitasan Black's running was quite splendid. The results of summer training camp were already showing.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa… haa-… fuu…
choice_data_list: Good work! That was a good run!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah! Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: No, it's nothing!
That night, after hearing there was a festival nearby, Kitasan Black and I had decided to go, but-

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Um, well you see. Before we head to the festival, do you have… a little bit of time?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Mmmm! Running here felt really good, you know～! Before I knew it, training was over in the blink of an eye.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: … because of Trainer-san I feel like I've grown, and I can say I'm proud of that.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Of course, there's still a lot more things I need to learn from now on but…
choice_data_list: It's because you worked hard, Kitasan

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Uu. Trainer-san, I…!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I believed Trainer-san was someone who was [Amazing, and could do anything well]!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: You answered all of my questions, when I was worried about something we'd solve it together. An [Amazing person] who could solve even really difficult issues, with simple solutions

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: But… when I told my dad about this, he told me something.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: [There's hard work that you can't see, too]

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …is what he said. Hearing those words, I remembered something.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I continued studying at home, just that. And also, just did what my family and coach kept telling me.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: With everyone's help I kept preparing. [To someday become a strong Uma Musume that can win a G1]. That's not just my dream.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: It's also my family's dearest wish. From back then and up to this day, we've kept aiming for that. Before I was even born…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …That's right. Even Dia-chan, was like that.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: It's so obvious, isn't it? Because everyone is like that, not just working hard where people can see it.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: But… unfortunately, I seemed to have forgotten that. That [Amazingness] overwhelmed me, until I finally realized the importance of [Hardwork].

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Trainer-san too, you worked hard too, didn't you? All for my sake.
choice_data_list: I'm just doing it because I want to

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Yeah. But that's why, I want to see that rewarded. Trainer-san's hardwork.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: And so my Dad said-

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: [The song that is sung while thinking of someone, is a song that will reach everyone's heart]

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …That's what he said. I had never really understood those words.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: That's why, with feelings of gratitude I need to work hard to return the favor. Not just being supported, but also by supporting.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Yes. Working hard during training so I can produce results, and asking for a day off…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I thought of a bunch of things, and tried to actually do a couple of them but… for some reason it wasn't going well.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …But, just a moment ago I thought [Ah, this is it].

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: The thing I really wanted to do… I realized what I could do for Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I just want Trainer-san to be happy!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Because, just a moment ago, when I saw Trainer-san's smile, it really made me happy!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I want your efforts to be rewarded, I want to show you how grateful I am. But, that isn't the my only answer-

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: The feeling of wanting to make you happy, I want Trainer-san to feel that from the bottom of my heart.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: That's probably the way I can [support]!
Those genuine and straight-forward words from Kitasan Black, made me feel a little embarrassed but-
choice_data_list: I'm glad we could both do that for each other

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: ! Yeah! It's great!!
Kitasan Black's expressions was all smiles, glittering like fireworks. Both of us aiming to make the other smile, it was very much a blessing.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Allllright! With a loud voice from within, let's go～!
With a relieved face, Kitasan Black threw both her arms in the air.
By supporting each other, both of us could stand tall. And with a stir, the sound of Taiko drums reverberated throughout the venue.
